turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm looking for a movie to watch tonight. I'm in the mood for something... thrilling, I guess. Maybe something like a good suspense or mystery?

turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I've seen both of those! Anything a little more...obscure? I feel like I've seen all the mainstream thrillers. I want something I haven't heard of before.
